snippet: In the latest twist of an increasingly bizarre story, China announced Thursday that a top Communist Party official spent a full day in the United States consulate in the western city of Chengdu.
lead_paragraph: In the latest twist of an increasingly bizarre story, China announced Thursday that a top Communist Party official spent a full day in the United States consulate in the western city of Chengdu.

headline.main: Mystery of China’s Missing Crime Fighter Deepens
headline.print_headline: Mystery of China’s Missing Crime Fighter Deepens
